Dreadplague opened her eyes and pushed the canopy of the CR chamber.
She looked around and searched for Darkangel or her father. She saw
none and went to the bridge. She looked at the global scanners and saw
that the Rust was still quite active. However, with so few metal to
devour, it wouldn't last long.

Dreadplague: No matter how that distresses the Maximals, I'll make
them run with their tail between their legs. What a wonderful prospect!
